channel.title: 3 problems , easy to solve i guess, help
channel.description:
FIRST PROBLEM:
Hey guys, i am using crazy-pkz source (delta)
i got this problem
when i press the
equipment stats or items kept on death buttons, nothing happen.
i think its a server side, if its not, could u tell me what to do (server and client sides)
look at this pic(shows u witch buttons i mean) : [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/sgkbjo.jpg[/img]
SECOND PROBLEM:
i forgot how to change the coords of the player respawn i mean(when a player makes a new char, the place he spawn, how can i change that?
or when he teles home ( i wanna change the coords of it))
THIRD PROBLEM:
on my server , sarasword spec always hit a number and a 0 like ( 23-0 or 40-0)
how can i change that ? i want it to hit in both times

item.title: 3 problems , easy to solve i guess, help
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

The 1st one, its common most servers are thinking when they got it it works but its just crappy just download another source.

Read full topic
item.source: 3 problems , easy to solve i guess, help

item.title: 3 problems , easy to solve i guess, help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

  1. It’s a server-side issue. Find out what packet is being sent to the server (find out ID) when you click one of those buttons, and after you’ve found out, post it here.

  2. Find out the coords for where new players are re-spawning, and just search for those coords in your source files and edit it.

  3. You need to give more information.

Read full topic
item.source: 3 problems , easy to solve i guess, help
